body_html: @asimshankar Thanks for the response. I've spoken to our iOS engineers a few more times and it seems like the memory leak does not actually happen in iOS land. This seems to be an issue on Android only, perhaps in the JNI methods?
body_text: @asimshankar Thanks for the response. I've spoken to our iOS engineers a few more times and it seems like the memory leak does not actually happen in iOS land. This seems to be an issue on Android only, perhaps in the JNI methods?
body: @asimshankar Thanks for the response. I've spoken to our iOS engineers a few more times and it seems like the memory leak does not actually happen in iOS land. This seems to be an issue on Android only, perhaps in the JNI methods?
